plugin_info.plugin_description: Export a network saved in Hydra to a JSON file.
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox stephen.knox@manchester.ac.uk (c) Copyright 20135, University of Manchester. For more information visit www.hydra-network.com

arg.name: Network ID
arg.help: The ID of the network to be exported

arg.name: Scenario ID
arg.help: The ID of the scenario to be exported. If no scenario is specified, all scenarios in the network will be exported.

arg.name: Target Dir
arg.help: The directory / folder you wish the file to export to. This defaults to the Desktop.

arg.name: Server URL
arg.help: The URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: Session ID
arg.help: The session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config

arg.name: Export as XML
arg.help: Export as an XML file instead of a JSON file.
